sentence.text: We present a case of a patient with long-standing hyperpigmented macules and erythematous papules over his chest, abdomen, back and positive regulation of neuron projection development, suggestive of Dowling-Degos disease (DDD).

entity.text: positive regulation of neuron projection development

sentence.text: In addition, there were hyperkeratotic papules, alternating protein phosphorylation and white natural killer cell activation involved in immune response-bed discolouration, and V-shaped nail notching consistent with Darier disease (DD).

entity.text: natural killer cell activation involved in immune response
